names.pinyin: ru yi jin huang san jia jian
names.english: modified as you desire golden yellow powder (topical)
names.commonEnglish: Modified As You Desire Golden Yellow Powder

actions: Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, reduces swelling and inflammation and stops pain.
Resolves Phlegm, dissipates nodules, reduces masses, clears Heat and reduces toxicity topically.
Clears Heat, drains Fire and resolves toxicity topically.
With Huang Lian, topically for scabies with cracked, itching skin that worsens at night with weeping lesions from scratching.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, resolves toxicity, dissipates nodules and alleviates pain and itching.

symptoms: The lesions appear on the head, face and extremities
The lesions are grain-like with a hard base
The lesions are yellowish-purplish in color

notes: Grind the ingredients into a very fine powder. Store in a dry cool place. When ready to use, mix with honey, tea, wine or petroleum jelly to form a paste. Apply 1-2 times daily.
